definition: sufferer/a victim of a calamity/a person in distress
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: It says they also tried to silence the victims' relatives with bribes and threats.
sentences.chinese: 並且威逼利誘受難者家屬保持沉默。

sentences.english: The government doles out something to help the victims.
sentences.chinese: 政府發放了一些救濟物品來幫助受難者。

sentences.english: Do not argue with the person if he/she disagrees with you.
sentences.chinese: 不要和受難者爭論，如果你們意見不一了。

sentences.english: Offering to help the accident victims seems as instinctive as breathing.
sentences.chinese: 對意外受難者的幫助就象呼吸一樣出於本能。

sentences.english: Dig up lots of massacre victims?
sentences.chinese: 挖了一堆大屠殺受難者出來？

sentences.english: They provided some necessary support for the sufferers.
sentences.chinese: 他們爲受難者提供了一些必要的援助。

sentences.english: The highest percentage of victim injuries was from blunt trauma and burns.
sentences.chinese: 受難者受傷的最高機率就是硬物外傷和燒傷。

sentences.english: Dozens of family members and local residents gathered together.
sentences.chinese: 許多受難者家屬和當地的民衆聚集到一起。

sentences.english: They are nothing more than a childish refusal to connect with the suffering of other human beings.
sentences.chinese: 這無異於幼稚地拒絕與人類中的受難者有所聯繫。
你的受難者們將被淨化。

sentences.english: The total amount of the compensation paid to the victims is estimated at $75 million.
sentences.chinese: 受難者總賠償金額預估約七千五百萬。

sentences.english: Suffering and pain are neither signs of weakness nor trophies of martyrdom.
sentences.chinese: 痛苦和折磨並非脆弱的象徵和受難者的紀念品。

sentences.english: Intoxicating joy is it for the sufferer to look away from his suffering and forget himself.
sentences.chinese: 避開苦難忘卻自我，是受難者陶醉其間的樂趣。

sentences.english: All that were true portraitures of victims in horrible air burst.
sentences.chinese: 這一切，都是可怕的空炸中受難者的真實寫照。

definition: Chen Chien-jen (1951-), Taiwanese politician, vice president of the Republic of China 2016-2020
fire of war everywhere (idiom); enveloped in the flames of war
to call loudly (idiom); to get people's attention/to make one's views known
